EmailTemplate.name: Payments have come in - need confimration on rate so i can create correct invoic
EmailTemplate.subject: Payments have come in - need confimration on rate so i can create correct invoices and apply funds before payroll. (1343151640.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Max, Just left you a voicemail. The invoicing needs to happen through MBO for Calvin group’s records and for ours. We need invoices so when the money comes in we have something to apply it to. I created the first invoice for you (using the attachments you had sent to Calving group.) I used the hours and the notes, but I did not have a rate. I asked you for the rate and you let me know it was $65 and Calvin is saying it is $50. I need to know the rate so our invoices can match what their payment is going to be. It is very easy for you to generate invoices in our system; all you need to do is enter the number of hours. If you want to put a note it for the time the hours covered (as you do on your invoices) you can do that as well by entering a “note.” I would like to review this with you via phone. Moving forward, PLEASE DO NOT SEND ANY MORE INVOICES TO CALIVN GROUP, simply enter your hours in MBO and we will invoice and Calvin will make payment on our invoice. Please send me any invoices you have sent to Calvin group to-date that you are running through MBO so I can figure out how to get these funds applied property. I need to get these funds applied today to get you on payroll so please consider this urgent. Please call me when you get this. Thanks,Sara From: Max Katz [mailto:max.katz.work@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, July 24, 2012 7:11 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Payments to Max Katz Sara, I don't understand what this invoice is on about. I'm invoicing the client directly. Please call me today if you still have not received a check from the client after mail is delivered. -Max On Mon, Jul 23, 2012 at 9:09 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Max, Ok, so to confirm: · We should revise our invoice to $50 per hour instead of $65 and resend (as Irena has requested.) · Would you like me to reach out to Irena about the payment? I thought it was best that you did (which is why I provided the wire and payment information in my other email) as I did not want to cause and trouble that might make her change her mind about remitting payment to us. If you would like me to work with her directly that is fine, I just need to know. Otherwise I will continue you communicate with you and you can pass along the information to Irena. Please confirm these items. Thanks, Sara From: Max Katz [mailto:max.katz.work@gmail.com <mailto:max.katz.work@gmail.com>] Sent: Monday, July 23, 2012 11:51 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Payments to Max Katz Yep, they're fucking me. It's been a month with no pay. Rent's due next week. I need the money. -Max On Mon, Jul 23, 2012 at 8:33 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Max, It can happen…I have seen it before. Did you see my two other emails (attached.) They are stating that your rate is 50 per hour not 65… Sara From: Max Katz [mailto:max.katz.work@gmail.com <mailto:max.katz.work@gmail.com>] Sent: Friday, July 20, 2012 4:34 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Fwd: Payments to Max Katz Sara, You ever hear of US mail taking longer than three days to arrive? -Max ---------- Forwarded message ---------- From: Irena Mozetich <finance@calvingroups.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:finance@calvingroups.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBB%2B0x3%2F%2BbXNab%2FlBXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>> Date: Fri, Jul 20, 2012 at 1:32 PM Subject: Re: Payments to Max Katz To: Max Katz <max.katz.work@gmail.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:max.katz.work@gmail.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBB%2B0x3%2F%2BbXNab%2FlBXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>>
Hi Max,
First, sorry about the empty email. I hit the wrong button.
So I put one check in the mailbox on Monday and one on Wednesday. I sent them on the address Sara gave me MBO Partners, Inc PO Box 823673 Philadelphia, PA 19182-3673
check# 1005 and 1008.
IrenaOn Fri, Jul 20, 2012 at 1:08 PM, Max Katz <max.katz.work@gmail.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:max.katz.work@gmail.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBB%2B0x3%2F%2BbXNab%2FlBXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>> wrote:Irena, I still have not received any payments from Calvin Group. Can you forward me the check numbers and amounts you sent and the address you mailed them to?
-Max
-- Best Regards,- - - Irena Mozetich | Finance Officer | Calvin Group w : 310.287.2400 <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&tel:310.287.2400?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBB%2B0x3%2F%2BbXNab%2FlBXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> x304 f : 310.287.1226 <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&tel:310.287.1226?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBB%2B0x3%2F%2BbXNab%2FlBXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> http://www.calvingroups.com/ <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.calvingroups.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBB%2B0x3%2F%2BbXNab%2FlBXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>.*NOTICE: this electronic mail (including any attachments) may contain information that is privileged, confidential, and/or otherwise protected from disclosure to anyone other than its intended recipient(s). Any dissemination or use of this electronic mail or its contents (including any attachments) by persons other than the intended recipient(s) is strictly prohibited. If you have received this message in error, please notify us immediately by reply e-mail so that we may correct our internal records. Please then delete the original message (including any attachments) in its entirety. P Please consider the environment before printing this e-mail.
